nodes.text: Imperial Supply, also known as the Imperial Supply Fleet, was an organization within the Galactic Empire responsible for the logistics of the Imperial Military. It was most likely a branch of the Imperial Navy, as graduates of the Imperial Merchant Galactic Academy were required to meet an obligation to the Imperial Supply Fleet before they could fully join the Merchant Galactic, a civilian auxiliary of the navy.
In 9 ABY, they set up a house, under orders from Grand Admiral Thrawn, for the clone of Jedi Master Jorus C'baoth on the planet of Jomark.
